content:
American firms lead the way, despite political setbacks

THE PROSPECT for America’s carbon footprint looked bleak after Donald Trump withdrew from the Paris Agreement in 2017. A tax on imported solar panels, coupled with the winding down of federal tax credits for both solar and wind, inspired little in the way of hope.

Despite the administration’s lack of support, American companies are leading the way when it comes to reducing carbon emissions. One of the ways they are doing this is through power-purchase agreements (PPAs), where they buy clean power straight from independent generators.

Data released this week by Bloomberg New Energy Finance show that corporate demand throughout the world, but particularly in America, has boomed. Companies worldwide signed a record 13.4GW worth of clean-energy contracts in 2018, more than double the amount the year before (see first chart). American companies accounted for more than 60% of this total.

Tech firms have played a part. Facebook purchased a whopping 2.6GW in 2018, and Google made headlines last year when it matched 100% of its annual electricity consumption with renewable-energy purchases. Firms outside Silicon Valley have also started to dip their toes in the PPA pond. AT&T was the second-largest buyer of clean-energy PPAs last year, and ExxonMobil became the first large oil company to sign one.

Companies have started to club together. RE100, an alliance of companies that includes Facebook and Apple, has 161 signatories with 100%-renewable-electricity targets. This is ambitious, though. To meet this target, companies will need to purchase an additional 190TWh of clean energy in 2030 (see second chart). The surge in American activity may merely reflect a scramble to procure clean energy before the tax credits are phased out. There is still some way to go before companies abandon dirty fuels completely.

ex: n. 前途；预期；景色
vi. 勘探，找矿
vt. 勘探，勘察

wp.Prospect Point: 普罗斯佩克特角;希望角;景观顶;展望角
wp.FUTURE PROSPECT: 未来展望;发展前景;未来期望;未来愿景

wp.developing prospect: 发展前景;发展方向;开发前景;发展趋势
wp.study prospect: 研究进展;研究展望;研究前景
wp.applied prospect: 应用前景;碱浮渣处理;应用展望;应用前景展望
wp.grand prospect: 宏伟的计划;远大的谋略

wp.bleak a: 荒凉的;寒冷刺骨的;没希望的;缺乏热情的
wp.Bleak Night: 守望者;片;青春夜行;英文片名
wp.Bleak Moments: 荒凉时分;暗淡时刻;英国

ex: adj. 阴冷的；荒凉的，无遮蔽的；黯淡的，无希望的；冷酷的；单调的
eg2: The  ground pullulated with jackrabbits.
荒凉的土地上到处是长耳大野兔。
That is why the outlook for the big, slow-growing creatures of the deep, some of which travel long distances, is so .
这就是那些深海里大而生长缓慢的动物前景黯淡的原因，其中有些动物生存中要游很长的距离。
They showed me into a bleak waiting room.
他们引我来到一间阴冷的会客室。

ex: n. 消费；消耗量；肺结核；肺病
网络 消费量；功耗；结核病
eg2: the production of fuel for domestic consumption(= to be used in the country where it is produced)
供国内消耗的燃料生产
Gas and oil consumption always increases in cold weather.
燃气和燃油的消耗量在天冷时总会增加。
The meat was declared unfit for human consumption .
这种肉被宣布不适于人食用。
He was advised to reduce his alcohol consumption.
他被劝告减少饮酒。
Her speech to party members was not intended for public consumption(= to be heard by the public) .
她对党员发表的讲话并不打算公诸大众。
Consumption rather than saving has become the central feature of contemporary societies.
现代社会的主要特征是消费而不是储蓄。

ex: v. 收缩；订约；感染
n. 【法】合同；〈非正式〉买凶杀人
网络 契约；合约；婚约
eg2: a contract of employment
雇用合同
a research contract
从事研究的合同
to enter into/make/sign a contract with the supplier
与供应商签订合同
These clauses form part of the contract between buyer and seller.
这些条款构成买卖双方所签合同的一部分。
a contract for the supply of vehicles
提供车辆的合约
to win/be awarded a contract to build a new school
获得承建一所新学校的合同
a contract worker(= one employed on a contract for a fixed period of time)
合同工
I was on a three-year contract that expired last week.
我签订的三年期合同已于上周期满。
Under the terms of the contract the job should have been finished yesterday.
根据合同的条款，这项工作本应于昨天完成。
She is under contract to(= has a contract to work for) a major American computer firm.
她已签约为一家大型美国计算机公司工作。
The offer has been accepted, subject to contract(= the agreement is not official until the contract is signed) .
此报价已获接受，尚须以签约为准。
They were sued for breach of contract(= not keeping to a contract) .
他们被指控违约。
to take out a contract on sb
雇凶手杀害某人
Glass contracts as it cools.
玻璃遇冷收缩。
a contracting market
萎缩的市场
The heart muscles contract to expel the blood.
心脏肌肉收缩以挤压出血液。
The exercise consists of stretching and contracting the leg muscles.
此项训练包括伸展和收缩腿部肌肉。
‘I will’ and ‘I shall’ are usually contracted to ‘I'll’(= made shorter) .
I will 和 I shall 通常缩约为 I'll。
to contract AIDS/a virus/a disease
感染艾滋病╱病毒╱疾病
The player is contracted to play until August.
这位选手签约参加比赛到八月份。
Several computer engineers have been contracted to the finance department.
有几位计算机工程师与财务部门签订了合同。
She has contracted to work 20 hours a week.
她已签订每周工作 20 小时的合同。

ex: n. 游一游；泡一泡；（通常指暂时的）减少；凹陷处
v. 蘸；浸；（使）下降；把（汽车前灯的）远光调为近光
网络 直插；双列直插(Dual Inline Package)；沉
eg2: He dipped the brush into the paint.
他拿画笔蘸了蘸颜料。
Dip your hand in to see how hot the water is.
把手伸进去看看水有多热。
The fruit had been dipped in chocolate.
这水果蘸过巧克力酱。
The sun dipped below the horizon.
太阳落到地平线下了。
Sales for this quarter have dipped from 38.7 million to 33 million.
本季度销售额从 3 870 万下降到 3 300 万。
The road dipped suddenly as we approached the town.
我们向镇里驶近时道路陡然下斜。
The plane dipped its wings.
机翼向下倾斜。
Let's go for a dip before breakfast.
我们早饭前去游一会儿泳吧。
a sharp dip in profits
利润急剧下降
a dip in the road
路上的凹陷处
Puddles had formed in the dips.
低洼处形成了一个个水坑。
A brief dip into history serves to confirm this view.
随便翻阅一下历史就足以证实这种观点。
He gave a dip of his head.
他点了点头。

ex: n. 电；电能；强烈的感情；激动
网络 电学；电力；电流
eg2: a waste of electricity
浪费电
The electricity is off(= there is no electric power supply) .
停电了。

ex: n. 排放；辐射；排放物；(书刊)发行
网络 发射；放射；散发
eg2: the emission of carbon dioxide into the atmosphere
向大气排放二氧化碳
emission controls
排放管制
The government has pledged to clean up industrial emissions.
政府已保证要清除工业排放物。

ex: n. 足迹；脚印；面积；（通信卫星）覆盖区
网络 足印；占用空间；占地面积
eg2: footprints in the sand
沙地足迹
muddy footprints on the kitchen floor
厨房地板上的泥脚印

ex: n. 发电机；发生器；电力公司
网络 生成器；产生器；编辑器
eg2: The factory's emergency generators were used during the power cut.
工厂应急发电机在停电期间用上了。
a wind generator(= a machine that uses the power of the wind to produce electricity)
风力发电机
The museum uses smells and smoke generators to create atmosphere.
博物馆利用气味和烟雾发生器制造气氛。
The company is a major generator of jobs.
这家公司创造了相当多的就业机会。
the UK's major electricity generator
英国主要的电力公司

ex: v. 取得；诱使（妇女）卖淫
网络 获得；采购；促成
eg2: She managed to procure a ticket for the concert.
她好不容易弄到一张音乐会入场券。
They procured a copy of the report for us.
他们为我们弄到了一份报告。
They procured us a copy of the report.
他们给我们弄到了一份报告。
He was accused of procuring under-age girls.
他被控唆使未成年女性卖淫。

wp.renewable resource: 可再生资源;不可再生资源;可再生能源;		可更新资源

ex: adj. 可再生的；可更新的；可继续的
n. 再生性能源
eg2: On the tiny blue planet we see from space, the light side of the force is clean, green and .
从宇宙中看，在这个小小的蓝色星球上，原力明亮的一面是洁净的、绿色的、可再生的。
Do any of you believe we can reduce the dependence on foreign oil without investing in alternative sources of energy,  energy?
你们有人相信我们可以不投资其他替代的能源、可再生能源而能减少对境外石油的依赖吗？
We have massive renewable energy potential but we use only a fraction of it.
我们有大量可用的可再生资源，但智能利用其中的一部分。

wp.Subway Scramble: 混乱地铁;杂乱地铁;硬盘版
wp.parallel scramble: 哪位有并行扰码;并行扰码

ex: vt. 攀登；使混杂，仓促凑成；扰乱
n. 抢夺，争夺；混乱，混乱的一团；爬行，攀登
vi. 爬行，攀登；不规则地生长；仓促行动
eg2: Faced by emergency situations people are thought to suddenly behave like selfish animals, trampling others in the scramble to escape.
在面临紧急情况时，人会突然表现得像自私的动物一样，在一阵混乱中相互踩踏以求逃命。
And we drove a rented car up the highway to the sun, where we watched marmosets  around above the snow line, then spent a few days at Kootenai Lodge on Swan Lake.
接着我们驾驶一辆租借的车沿着公路，开向太阳升起的地方，观看狨猴沿着长年积雪的雪线爬行，随后在斯旺莱克的库特内旅馆住了几天。
A NEW scramble for Africa is under way.
一场对非洲的新的争夺正在进行。

ex: n. 挫折；退步；逆流
eg2: It is an unexpected setback in her fortunes.
这是她好运中的一次意外的挫折。
One minor setback is nothing if you really want something and are willing to work for it.
如果你真的想要它，并且愿意为它付出，那么这一点小小的挫折不算什么。
Any storm would be a frustrating setback as the British energy giant may be within days of permanently plugging the well, which began leaking after a deadly explosion on April 20.
任何风暴对要在数天内对漏油井永久封盖的英国能源巨头来说都是令人沮丧的挫折，漏油开始于四月20日的致命性的爆炸之后。

ex: adj. 签署的
n. （协议的）签署者
网络 签字人；签约国；签字者
eg2: a signatory of the Declaration of Independence
《独立宣言》的签署者
Many countries are signatories to/of the Berne Convention.
很多国家都是《伯尔尼公约》的签署国。

ex: n. 汹涌；大浪，波涛；汹涌澎湃；巨涌
v. 汹涌；起大浪，蜂拥而来

wp.Surge Arrester: 避雷器;过电压吸收器;		电涌放电器;冲击吸收器
wp.surge suppressor: 突波遏抑器;电涌抑制器;浪涌抑制器;电涌保护器
wp.surge bin: 缓冲仓;贮仓;平衡料仓;储料斗
wp.surge drum: 平衡筒;		贮液筒;缓冲罐;中间罐
wp.surge capability: 过载能力;缓冲能力;浪涌能力

eg2: But for some people merely imagining this scene creates an adrenaline .
但是对于某些人但是想象这一幕就会肾上腺素激增。

ex: v. 收回（withdraw的过去式）
eg2: They withdrew and settled in this area.
他们收回这一地区并且在这里定居。
In recent years, Israel withdrew from South Lebanon and Gaza.
近些年里，以色列从南黎巴嫩和加沙撤出。
I ordered bomb and missile attacks on the Iraqi forces and they .
我命令对伊拉克军队发动炸弹和导弹攻击，他们撤军了。

Title: Companies bought record amounts of clean energy in 2018

paperStatistics.title: Companies bought record amounts of clean energy in 2018
paperStatistics.desc: American firms lead the way, despite political setbacks
